org.jgrapes.portal.events

Class NotifyPortletView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>
      • org.jgrapes.core.Event<java.lang.Void>
        • org.jgrapes.portal.events.NotifyPortletView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>, org.jgrapes.core.Associator, org.jgrapes.core.Eligible

    public class NotifyPortletView
extends org.jgrapes.core.Event<java.lang.Void>

    A notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) to be sent to the portlet view (the browser).

    • Constructor Detail

      • NotifyPortletView

        public NotifyPortletView(java.lang.String portletClass,
                         java.lang.String portletId,
                         java.lang.String method,
                         java.lang.Object... params)

        Creates a new event.

        Parameters:
        portletClass - the portlet class (used to look up the available functions)
        portletId - the portlet (view) that the notification is directed at
        method - the method (function) to be executed
        params - the parameters
